msg: ARIES-361: Change to RequirementImpl.isSatisfied(): getProperties() mangles version strings whereas getPropertiesAsMap() does not. Also a small fix to OBRAriesResolver.

msg: o use a temporary schemamanager variable till the schema loading gets completed
(it fixes the problem with loading schema while using a loader like NetworkSchemaLoader which uses the same connection to load schema)
